sentences.en: Bombay is linked to the mainland by a causeway.
sentences.cn: 孟买和本土间有一条堤道相连.

sentences.en: Ferry services operate between the islands and the mainland.
sentences.cn: 在大陆和各岛之间有轮渡服务.

sentences.en: flights between a Greek island and the mainland
sentences.cn: 希腊一海岛和本土之间的航班

sentences.en: Hong Kong's prosperity relies heavily on mainland.
sentences.cn: 香港的繁荣在很大程度上依赖于大陆.

sentences.en: In autumn 1944 the allies invaded the Italian mainland at Anzio and Salerno.
sentences.cn: 1944年秋，盟军从安齐奥与萨勒诺攻入意大利本土。

sentences.en: Ischia was now connected to the mainland water supply.
sentences.cn: 伊斯基亚这时已经通上了大陆的水。

sentences.en: She was going to Nanaimo to catch the ferry to the mainland.
sentences.cn: 她准备去纳奈莫乘渡船回大陆。

sentences.en: Similar trends are observable in mainland Europe.
sentences.cn: 类似的趋势在欧洲大陆也能见到。

sentences.en: The bridge joins the island to the mainland.
sentences.cn: 这座大桥把小岛和大陆衔接起来.

sentences.en: The car ferries from the mainland are often fully booked by February.
sentences.cn: 从大陆出发的汽车轮渡常常在2月前就被预订一空。

sentences.en: The gunboat opened fire on the mainland.
The island is connected by a steamer service to the mainland.
sentences.cn: 轮船航运把该岛与大陆联系起来.

sentences.en: The island may be reached by boat from the mainland.
sentences.cn: 这个岛屿可以从大陆乘小船到达。

sentences.en: The new bridge will link the island to the mainland.
sentences.cn: 新的桥梁将把该岛与大陆连接在一起.

sentences.en: These elongate sand bodies are attached to a bulge of the mainland.
sentences.cn: 这些长条形砂体连接于主陆的突出部位.

sentences.en: They have relatives on the mainland.

trans.tran_en: the main area of land that forms a country, as compared to islands near it that are also part of that country
